SELECT wpp.ID AS aid, wpp.post_date AS DATE, wpp.post_title AS title, (SELECT guid FROM wp_posts WHERE id = wppm.meta_value) AS img, wpu.ID AS author_id, wpu.display_name AS author
FROM wp_posts wpp LEFT JOIN wp_users wpu ON wpp.post_author = wpu.ID LEFT JOIN wp_postmeta wppm ON wpp.ID = wppm.post_id LEFT JOIN wp_term_relationships wptr ON wpp.`ID` = wptr.`object_id`
LEFT JOIN wp_term_taxonomy wptt ON wptr.`term_taxonomy_id` = wptt.`term_taxonomy_id` WHERE wpp.post_status = 'publish' AND wpp.post_type = 'post' AND wppm.meta_key = '_thumbnail_id' AND wptr.`term_taxonomy_id` = #{categoryId} AND wptt.`taxonomy` = 'category' ORDER BY wpp.post_date DESC
